title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Get the I Survived Cayo Perico Tee and More
content:
Even if you can’t make it past the initial wave, everyone gets a souvenir in the form of the I Survived Cayo Perico Tee just for braving these reanimated ravers (delivered within 72 hours of playing).

Pirates abide by a code — no prey, no pay. You can earn The Buccaneer Outfit plus GTA$100,000 in loot by completing all ten waves of a Survival through September 10.
